meanings.definition: In the month immediately preceding the present one.
meanings.sent1: My birthday is in the ultimo month of the year.
meanings.sent2: The ultimo snowfall of winter covered the ground in white.
meanings.sent3: The cat's ultimo attempt to catch the mouse failed comically.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like the ultimo ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's ultimo reminder about the upcoming test caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: The last day of the month.
meanings.sent1: On the ultimo of December, we celebrate New Year's Eve.
meanings.sent2: She always pays her bills on the ultimo to avoid late fees.
meanings.sent3: The party on the ultimo of the month was a blast!
meanings.sent4: The clock struck midnight on the ultimo, marking the end of the day.
meanings.sent5: The ultimos of each month are always busy at the bank.
